biocontainers.name: ldsc
biocontainers.summary: ldsc is a tool for estimating heritability and genetic correlation from GWAS summary statistics. It also computes LD Scores.

biotools.summary: ldsc is a command line tool for estimating heritability and genetic correlation from GWAS summary statistics. ldsc also computes LD Scores.

bioschemas.name: LDSC
bioschemas.summary: ldsc is a command line tool for estimating heritability and genetic correlation from GWAS summary statistics. ldsc also computes LD Scores.
